thread.title: Watch Matt Damon's and Jimmy Kimmel's Epic Oscars Feud (Video)
thread.title_full: Watch Matt Damon's and Jimmy Kimmel's Epic Oscars Feud (Video)

author: Samantha Leal
title: Watch Matt Damon's and Jimmy Kimmel's Epic Oscars Feud (Video)
text: Ryan Gosling Brought His Sister to the Oscars Then, in a series of videos in which Hollywood stars looked back at their favorite movies, Kimmel took a satirical spin by looking at Damon's We Bought a Zoo . "You can see him working. It's so effortful," Kimmel says about Damon's performance. Later, as Damon took the stage to present (after being announced alongside longtime friend and collaborator Ben Affleck as a "guest"), music played every time he opened his mouth. "Are you playing me off? Seriously?" Damon says, before the camera goes to Kimmel conducting the orchestra. "Wrap it up! We want to go home!" GIF GIF Giphy We're usually ones for making up, but honestly, we hope this continues forever. We're counting on you, guys.
